name: Top Programming Languages
description: Python, JavaScript, Java, C/C++, and C# are classified as the most popular programming languages in 2024 according to recent data.

name: Top Programming Frameworks
description: According to current data, some of the most popular programming frameworks in 2024 include: React, Angular, Vue.js, Django, Express.js, Node.js, and Ruby on Rails.

name: In-Demand Tech Jobs
description: Some of the hottest tech jobs of 2024 feature: Software Engineering, Cloud Engineering, Data Analytics, IT Support Technician, and Project Manager.
